temporal.title: Temporal Analysis
temporal.description: Analysis of system behavior over time.

dataNotCollected.title: Temporal profile data not collected
dataNotCollected.description: To view these charts, re-run the simulation with 'Collect Temporal Profile' enabled in the advanced options.

gantt.title: Gantt Chart
gantt.description: Timeline of channel activity and request processing.

dataNotCollected.title: Gantt chart data not collected
dataNotCollected.description: To view this chart, re-run the simulation with 'Collect Gantt Chart Data' enabled in the advanced options.

charts.title: Service Time Analysis
charts.description: Visual analysis of collected service time data.

dataNotCollected.title: Service time data not collected
dataNotCollected.description: To view these charts, re-run the simulation with 'Collect Service Times' enabled in the advanced options.
